channel.title: Template hosting tips?
channel.description:
This is probably going to be a long development, so I don't really plan on starting on it [i]right[/i] away... But In the future, I'm planning on setting up a web template hosting site in which I'll be creating templates from scratch and giving them up for download. Later, I hope that I can create a premium and make a profit.
Does anyone have any tips that I should know about?

item.title: Template hosting tips?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

…

MAKE SOME TEMPLATES.
+
POST IN WEB DESIGN SECTION.

Advice

Read full topic

item.title: Template hosting tips?
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:17, topic:323403”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=419795.msg3087028#msg3087028 date=1262573753]
Why don’t you do some market research for yourself, like every other fucking business that has ever been started? None of us have ever set up “template hosting sites”, and even if we had, why would we want to make it easier for the competition?

Also, notice how the above questions are specific, directed, and answerable, unlike yours.
[/quote]So now you realize what I’ve been getting at. How are my questions not answerable? I don’t mind the fact that there aren’t any users here that haven’t set up a template hosting site, in which case I could wait and the thread would potentially die, but the fact that you feel the need to continue something without any other reason other than to belittle me is almost amusing. Do you have any other reason for posting in here? Because you’ve said you don’t have any advice, which was the “ITT”.

edit: lock the thread; it’s going nowhere.[/quote]your questions are not answerable based on the fact that they are so fucking generic that they do not address a specific issue. he is posting here to inform you that your question is invalid, and not to get your hopes up by asking such useless questions which you will not retrieve answers from; if you werent so fucking obnoxious you might have realized this in unhandled’s first reply

and stop being so hypocritical; you got the same answer from over five different people, yet even then you continued to post in this fruitless thread

so how about instead of criticizing the people that have the potential to help you in the future with this project when asking valid questions, you refrain from a useless attempt to retaliate?

Read full topic

item.title: Template hosting tips?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

You’re all incredibly ignorant. I don’t need advice as to how to make the templates, I don’t need critisism on the way my templates look, and I don’t need this shit:

[quote=“inertia, post:13, topic:323403”]lol this is like one of those moparscape questions

how do i set up my vps

brb writing a tutorial on how to run a template hosting site!![/quote]inertia, you’re still a douche bag no matter how much you feel the need to use mscp as a block to step upon.

I want to know if there is anything I should watch out for, easy ways to set up premiums, mistakes anyone has made in the past that you think I could benefit from if I knew of them to avoid. Nothing literally on how to develop my site. I’ve explained this as much as a possibly could without sounding like I’m talking to a retard.

[quote=“Uriko, post:11, topic:323403”]Do you not understand what Unhandled is getting at? You’re procrastinating, if anything you should have came to us with designs by now and been asking us if you are ‘following the right path’[/quote]By the time I have set everything up it would be a complete waste to start over.

I don’t want your advice so I can follow it as you spoon feed it to me. It would just be nice to have a little bit of information that I could possibly use in the future in order to achieve what I want without the struggle.

[quote=“abraham2119, post:12, topic:323403”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=419795.msg3086494#msg3086494 date=1262541875]

[quote author=Unhandled link=topic=419795.msg3085037#msg3085037 date=1262452413]
Yes, stop procrastinating and waiting for us to tell you what to do, and make your damn website.
[/quote]Thank you, and I apologize for the other half of this community, as I know most of you aren’t assholes.
[/quote]guess again[/quote]There are a few people over here that are worth the time to talk to.

Read full topic

or something completely different like tips on the template design[/quote]My mistake, honestly I assumed that it was apparent =. I know how to make the templates. Are there any holes that I should avoid, paths I should take, etc., in order to make it a lot easier.
